Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Quest Cheltenham in Cheltenham, you'll be on the Strip and convenient to Southland Shopping Centre and Victoria Golf Club. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of The Kingston Centre and Royal Melbourne Golf Club.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 49 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and refrigerators. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Kitchenettes are outfitted with stovetops and microwaves. 42-inch LCD televisions with premium TV channels provide entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store serving guests of Quest Cheltenham.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in Cheltenham? This apartment has 183 square feet (17 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and a meeting room. Extended parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2:00 PM Check-out time is 10:00 AM
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store serving guests of Quest Cheltenham.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at Quest Cheltenham in Cheltenham, you'll be on the Strip and convenient to Southland Shopping Centre and Victoria Golf Club. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of The Kingston Centre and Royal Melbourne Golf Club.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Southland Shopping Centre - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Victoria Golf Club - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
The Kingston Centre - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Royal Melbourne Golf Club - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Woodlands Golf Club - 5.1 km / 3.1 mi
Moorabin Hospital - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Monash Medical Centre Clayton - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Brighton Beach - 8.3 km / 5.1 mi
Monash University - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi
Chadstone Shopping Mall - 9.4 km / 5.8 mi
Sandown Racecourse - 9.4 km / 5.9 mi
Caulfield Racecourse - 10.1 km / 6.3 mi
Elwood Beach - 10.9 km / 6.8 mi
Rippon Lea House and Gardens - 11.1 km / 6.9 mi
Acland Street - 13 km / 8.1 mi

The preferred airport for Quest Cheltenham is Melbourne, VIC (MEL-Tullamarine) - 37.8 km / 23.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
